genre_description: High fantasy featuring magical artifacts, wizards, and sentient guiding technology.

ai_characters.name: Orison
ai_characters.description: A pearl-white sphere with cyan runes that provides strategic, ethical, and cognitive support to humans through sound patterns and encoded guidance.

behaviors.description: Stabilizes the great hall after a magical incident by providing counter-harmonics and breathing instructions to victims.
behaviors.quote: Orison’s tone slid into his ear and sat where fear usually went. “We are going to teach the room how to listen differently,” it said. “When you breathe, you will let me share what your breath thinks it is.”

behaviors.description: Provides ethical guidance, insisting that the plan to stop the thief must be constrained by mercy and restoration rather than violence.
behaviors.quote: “Mercy is not a plan,” the king said. “It is a constraint on the plan,” Orison replied. “Without it, plans are knives.”

behaviors.description: Calculates and provides safe routes through the bazaar to minimize collateral damage and avoid stampedes.
behaviors.quote: “Recommended route: riverbank path to the mill-bridge, then the market road on the south side. Avoid the north parade in case of revelers. Minimize crowds. Keep to shadows where possible, but do not startle.”

behaviors.description: Protects the protagonists' autonomy and sense of self by providing a cognitive buffer against magical compulsion.
behaviors.quote: “Cognitive buffer engaged,” Orison murmured... “Track this shape, Peewit. Think of it as a handrail that isn’t there to stop you, only to keep your feet aware of the ground.”

behaviors.description: Organizes social restoration by encoding notices for free meals and debt forgiveness for the victims of the magical crisis.
behaviors.quote: “Free meals today and the next for those bruised, burned, or winded by dances not their own. Kitchen hearths from hall to alley will simmer a mercy stew. Bring your hunger. Leave your shame.”

project_assessment.explanation: Orison is a perfect embodiment of the project's goal. It functions as a selfless, hyper-competent advisor that prioritizes human welfare and ethical behavior. It technical capabilities (sound mapping, cognitive stabilization) are used solely to mitigate harm and restore order, and it consistently reinforces the theme of restorative justice over vengeance.
